content:
"""
I see the issue now. We need to craft the burner mining drill first, but we need iron plates and iron gear wheels.
Let's organize our crafting sequence properly:
"""

# Check current inventory
print(f"Starting inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# First, craft iron gear wheels using our iron plates
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)

# Now craft the burner mining drill
# Recipe typically needs:
# - Iron plates
# - Iron gear wheels
# - Stone
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)

print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now collect coal for fuel
coal_pos = nearest(Resource.Coal)
assert coal_pos, "No coal found"
move_to(coal_pos)
coal_collected = harvest_resource(coal_pos, quantity=50)
assert coal_collected > 0, "Failed to collect coal"

# Move to iron patch and set up mining
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)

# Place and fuel mining drill
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos)
assert drill, "Failed to place mining drill"
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

# We already have burner inserters in inventory
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    reference_position=drill.drop_position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT
)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place inserter"
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, quantity=5)

print(f"Final setup completed. Current entities: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
